text: Franco Latini (12 September 1927 – 2 February 1991) was an Italian actor and voice actor. He was born in Pomezia, Italy. For many years, he gave his voice to many animated characters owned by Warner Bros., Disney and Hanna-Barbera. In his live action roles, he voiced Stan Laurel in the 1968–1970 Italian broadcasts of Laurel and Hardy. Latini died of a stroke on 2 February 1991 at the age of 63. He was the father of Fabrizio Vidale, Laura Latini and Ilaria Latini. == References == == Other websites == * Category:1927 births Category:1991 deaths Category:Actors from Rome Category:Italian stage actors Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian voice actors Category:Deaths from stroke
title: Franco Latini
